General.Name: Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk
General.Description: PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk operates in the paper packaging industry in Indonesia, Asia, the United States, Australia, the Middle East, Africa, and Europe. The company operates through two segments: Cultural Paper and Pulp; and Industrial Paper and Tissue Products. It provides industrial paper, including linerboards, corrugating medium, corrugated shipping containers, and boxboards; and cultural papers, such as printing, writing, and photocopy paper, as well as financing, investment, and trading services. The company was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Indah Kiat Pulp & Paper Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Purinusa Ekapersada.
General.Address: Tower 2, Sinar Mas Land Plaza, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10350
